ai-dhp:362.4_0: that is what they call a mendicant.

ai-dhp:364.1_0: Delighting in the teaching, enjoying the teaching,
ai-dhp:364.3_0: a mendicant who recollects the teaching
ai-dhp:364.4_0: doesn’t decline in the true teaching.”
ai-dhp:365.1_0: A well-off mendicant ought not look down
ai-dhp:365.2_0: on others, nor should they be envious.
ai-dhp:366.1_0: If a mendicant is poor in offerings,
ai-dhp:366.2_0: the well-to-do ought not look down on them.
ai-dhp:366.3_0: For the gods indeed praise them,
ai-dhp:366.4_0: who are tireless and pure of livelihood.

ai-dhp:367.3_0: who does not grieve for that which is lost,
ai-dhp:367.4_0: is said to be a mendicant.
ai-dhp:368.1_0: A mendicant who meditates on love,
ai-dhp:369.2_0: When bailed out it will float lightly.
ai-dhp:369.3_0: Having cut off desire and hate,
ai-dhp:370.1_0: Five to cut, five to drop,
ai-dhp:370.3_0: A mendicant must escape five chains

ai-dhp:371.2_0: Don’t let the mind delight in the senses!

ai-dhp:388.0_0: On a brahmin who had gone forth
ai-dhp:388.1_0: A brahmin’s so-called because they bar out evil,
ai-dhp:388.2_0: an ascetic’s so-called since they live a serene life.
ai-dhp:388.3_0: (But) he has abandoned the stain of stinginess,
ai-dhp:389.1_0: One should never strike a brahmin,
ai-dhp:389.3_0: Woe to the one who hurts a brahmin,
ai-dhp:389.4_0: and woe for the one who retaliates.
ai-dhp:390.1_0: Nothing is better for a brahmin
ai-dhp:390.2_0: when the mind is held back from what is dear,
ai-dhp:390.3_0: whenever his mind turns back from violence,
ai-dhp:391.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:392.2_0: as taught by the fully awakened Buddha:
ai-dhp:392.4_0: as a brahmin honors the sacred flame.
ai-dhp:393.1_0: Not by matted hair or family,
ai-dhp:393.3_0: One who has truth and principle,
ai-dhp:393.4_0: they are pure, they are brahmins.
ai-dhp:394.1_0: Why the matted hair, you fool,
ai-dhp:394.2_0: and why the skin of deer?
ai-dhp:394.4_0: yet you polish up your outsides.
ai-dhp:395.1_0: A person who wears robes of rags,
ai-dhp:395.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:396.1_0: I don’t call someone a brahmin
ai-dhp:396.2_0: after the mother or womb they came from.
ai-dhp:396.6_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:397.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:398.1_0: They’ve cut the strap and harness,

ai-dhp:399.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.

ai-dhp:401.1_0: Like water from a lotus leaf,

ai-dhp:401.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:402.2_0: in this life the end of suffering;
ai-dhp:402.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:403.2_0: expert in the variety of paths;
ai-dhp:403.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.

ai-dhp:404.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:405.3_0: not killing or causing others to kill:
ai-dhp:405.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:406.2_0: they’re extinguished among those who’ve taken up arms.

ai-dhp:409.3_0: fine or coarse, beautiful or ugly:
ai-dhp:409.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:410.2_0: in this world or the next.
ai-dhp:410.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:411.2_0: knowledge has freed them of indecision,
ai-dhp:411.3_0: they’ve plunged right into the deathless:

ai-dhp:412.1_0: But one living a spiritual life,
ai-dhp:412.2_0: to both good and bad deeds
ai-dhp:412.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:413.3_0: they’ve ended desire to be reborn:
ai-dhp:413.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:414.1_0: They’ve got past this grueling swamp
ai-dhp:414.3_0: They’ve crossed over to the far shore,
ai-dhp:414.6_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:415.2_0: and have gone forth from lay life;
ai-dhp:415.3_0: they’ve ended rebirth in the sensual realm:
ai-dhp:415.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:416.2_0: and have gone forth from lay life;
ai-dhp:416.3_0: they’ve ended craving in this very life:
ai-dhp:416.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:416.6_0: and have gone forth from lay life;
ai-dhp:416.7_0: they’ve ended craving in this very life:
ai-dhp:416.8_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:417.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:418.2_0: they’re cooled and free of attachments;
ai-dhp:418.3_0: a hero, master of the whole world:
ai-dhp:418.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:419.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:420.3_0: the perfected ones with defilements ended:
ai-dhp:420.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:421.1_0: They have nothing before or after,
ai-dhp:421.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:422.3_0: the one worthy of honors the Buddha,
ai-dhp:422.4_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:423.2_0: seeing heaven and places of loss,
ai-dhp:423.3_0: and have attained the end of rebirth;
ai-dhp:423.5_0: at the summit of spiritual perfection:
ai-dhp:423.6_0: that’s who I call a brahmin.
ai-dhp:423.7_0: The group of six monks from the group of six is finished.
